prefs-help-yourpassword: Akaunti yinu pala yasokonezeka ingapulumusika. Wonani $1 pala mukukhumba vyakusintha vinyake.
tog-prefershttps: Nyengo zose nigwiliske ntchito kulumikiza kwa intaneti kwa chitetezo chikulu pala nili mkati mwa akaunti yane
tog-fancysig: Tola siginecha ngati ni malemba gha wiki (kwambula kulumikiza ku jani linu)
tog-requireemail: Nitumilani kalata yakufwatula pasiwedi pekha pala naika kalata na zina ilo nkhugwiliska ntchito vyapelekeka.
tog-ccmeonemails: Nane niŵeso na makalata gha pa intaneti agho nkhutuma ku ŵanyane
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Nilembelani kalata yapa intaneti pala jani panji chinthu chasinthika icho chili pakuoneleleka pane
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Nilembelani kalata yapa intaneti pala jani lane lakuchezgela lasinthika
tog-enotifminoredits: Nilembelani kalata yapa intaneti pala kalikose kachitika pa majani agho nkhuonelela
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Vumbula adilesi yane mu vimanyisko vya makalata
tog-diffonly: Kuoneska yayi ivyo vili pa jani pasi pa vyakupambana viŵili
tog-norollbackdiff: Kuoneska kupambana yayi pala nkhuwezgeleska kumanyuma vyakulemba
tog-showrollbackconfirmation: Woneska batani la kusimikizga pala nadofya pakuwezgeleska kumanyazuma kwa uyo wakamalila kulemba
tog-editsectiononrightclick: Yambiska kulemba pa malo mwakwizila kudofya kumalyelo pa mutu
editfont-style: Sintha malo gha mtundu wa malemba:
tog-minordefault: Chongelathu vyakulemba vyose kukhala vyakusintha pachoko mwanyengo zose
tog-forceeditsummary: Nichichizgani pala nkhujala kulemba kwambula kulongosola ivyo nasitha (panji kuwezgeleska majalilo gha nyengo zose)
tog-useeditwarning: Nichenjezgani pala nkhuleka jani kwambula kusunga ivo nalembanga
tog-previewontop: Woneska chiyezgelelo pambele bokosi lakulembamo lindaoneke
tog-uselivepreview: Woneska chiyezgelelo kwambula jani kuwa liphya
tog-usenewrc: Gulu lasintha mwakuyana na jani mu vyakusintha vyasono na mwakuonelela
tog-hideminor: Kubisa vakulembeka vichoko ku ivo vasinthika mwasono sono
tog-hidepatrolled: Kubisa vyakulembeka vakuoneleleka kufuma ku  vyakusintha vyasono
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Kubisa majani ghakuoneleleka pa mndandanda wa majani ghaphya
tog-shownumberswatching: Longola nambala ya ŵagwiliski awo ŵakuonelela
tog-extendwatchlist: Kuzgani jani lakuonelela kuti muone vyakusintha vyose, kupambana na vichoko
tog-watchlistunwatchlinks: Sazgapo malemba gha kuonelela/kwambula kuonelela ({{int:Watchlist-unwatch}}/{{int:Watchlist-unwatch-undo}}) ku majani gha kuonelela agho ghasinthika (pakukhumbika JavaScript kuti vyakusintha vyasono vioneke)
tog-watchlisthidebots: Bisa vyakulemba vya chidoli ku kuonelela kwane
tog-watchlisthideanons: Bisa vyakulemba vya ŵagwiliski ŵambula kupanga akaunti pa majani ghakuonelela
tog-watchlisthideliu: Bisa vyakulemba vya awo ŵana ma akaunti pakuonelela kwane
tog-watchlistreloadautomatically: Welezgaso kuoneska majani gha kuonelela pala kusintha kunyake kwazomelezgeka(pakukhumbika JavaScript)
tog-watchlisthidepatrolled: Bisa vyakulemba vya majani ghakuzomelezgeka na ŵalongozgi ku majani ghakuonelela
tog-watchdefault: Sazga majani na vinthu ivo nkhusintha pa mndandanda wa kuonelela
tog-watchmoves: Sazga majani na vinthu ivo nkhusintha mazina pa mndandanda wa kuonelela
tog-watchdeletion: Sazga majani na vinthu ivo nkhufufuta pa mndandanda wa kuonelela
tog-watchcreations: Sazga majani agho nkhuyata na vinthu ivo nkhukwezgela pa mndandanda wa kuonelela
tog-watchuploads: Sazga vinthu ivo nkhukwezgela pa mndandanda wa kuonelela
tog-watchrollback: Sazga majani agho vyakulemba vyake naviweleleska kwa kale pa munthu uyo wakamalila kulemba pa mndandanda wa kuonelela
